member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_ENCODE_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_ENCODE_INFO structure contains information on a message receiver used to decrypt the session key needed to decrypt the message contents. This structure is used with CMS low level messages using any of the key management methods.

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_ENCODE_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this data structure.

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_ENCODE_INFO.RecipientPublicKey
member.summary: A structure that contains the recipient's public key.

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_ENCODE_INFO.RecipientId
member.summary: The that identifies a message recipient's public key.

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_ENCODE_INFO.Date
member.summary: Optional FILETIME. Applicable only if the identifies the receiver's public key with a KEY_IDENTIFIER.

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_ENCODE_INFO.pOtherAttr
member.summary: Optional. Pointer to a . Applicable only if the CERT_ID identifies the receiver's public key with a KEY_IDENTIFIER.
